flixel.system.input.gamepad.FlxGamepad

type
class

Constructor

new(ID : Int, ?GlobalDeadZone : Float)

Instance Variables

axis(null,default) : Array<Float>

ball : flixel.util.FlxPoint

buttons : Map<Int, FlxGamepadButton>

deadZone : Float

Gamepad deadzone. Sets the sensibility. Less this number the more gamepad is sensible. Should be between 0.0 and 1.0.

hat : flixel.util.FlxPoint

DPAD on Xbox Gamepad

id : Int

Instance Methods

anyButton() : Bool

returns
Whether any buttons are currently pressed.
Check to see if any buttons are pressed right now.

anyInput() : Bool

returns
Whether any buttons are currently pressed.
Check to see if any buttons are pressed right or Axis, Ball and Hat Moved now.

destroy() : Void

getAxis(AxisID : Int) : Float

getButton(ButtonID : Int) : FlxGamepadButton

justPressed(ButtonID : Int) : Bool

parameters
ButtonID The button id (from 0 to 7).
returns
Whether the button was just pressed
Check to see if this button was just pressed.

justReleased(ButtonID : Int) : Bool

parameters
buttonID The button id (from 0 to 7).
returns
Whether the button is just released.
Check to see if this button is just released.

pressed(ButtonID : Int) : Bool

parameters
ButtonID The button id (from 0 to 7).
returns
Whether the button is pressed
Check to see if this button is pressed.

reset() : Void

update() : Void

Updates the key states (for tracking just pressed, just released, etc).
